com.cas.utility

Class AbstractCoverFlowImageAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • BaseAdapter
      • com.cas.utility.AbstractCoverFlowImageAdapter
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ReflectingImageAdapter, ResourceImageAdapter

    public abstract class AbstractCoverFlowImageAdapter
extends BaseAdapter
    This class is an adapter that provides base, abstract class for images adapter.
